cards.name: The Astral Heritage Circuit
cards.summary: This journey is where stone meets stardust—where heritage doesn’t stand still, it orbits through time.
cards.detail: The trek to Tungnath and Chandrashila offers a spiritual and scenic journey through the Garhwal Himalayas. Starting from Chopta, this moderate trail winds through dense forests and alpine meadows before reaching Tungnath — the world’s highest Shiva temple. A further ascent to Chandrashila summit rewards trekkers with a breathtaking panoramic view of snow-capped Himalayan peaks including Nanda Devi, Trishul, and Kedarnath. This trek is ideal for beginners and nature lovers.
